About me

My name is Andrei Kaliada

Polite and enthusiastic, I am interested in IT and everything in its orbit. I am engaged in the development of web applications and the creation of adaptive and cross-browser sites. Since this area is very interesting for me, I strive every day to get more experience in this area.
